price: Dájúdájú ó rí nínú àwọn àmì Olúwa rẹ̀, tó tóbi.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
